channel.title: [delta][317] shop buys players item +stocks it
channel.description: All of my shops are setup and i made a general store that you can sell any item in for gp. would anyone know how to make the store stock and resell the item a players sells to another player? -e.g. Store stocks nothing *john sells AGS to store for gp store stocks the 1 ags *bob buys AGS from store for gp store no longer stocks ags

item.title: [delta][317] shop buys players item +stocks it
item.dc:creator: @daemonic123 daemonic123
item.description:
@daemonic123 wrote:

All of my shops are setup and i made a general store that you can sell any item in for gp. would anyone know how to make the store stock and resell the item a players sells to another player?
-e.g.
Store stocks nothing
*john sells AGS to store for gp
store stocks the 1 ags
*bob buys AGS from store for gp
store no longer stocks ags

Read full topic
